text: Timothy Charles Smith (3 July 1961 â€“ 21 July 2020) was an English singer- songwriter, multi-instrumentalist, record producer and music video director. He was best known as the frontman of the cult English band Cardiacs. He was born in Carshalton, Surrey. In June 2008, Smith suffered from a heart attack and stroke which left him physically disabled. He died on 21 July 2020, aged 59.Tim Smith (Cardiacs) RIP ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:English singer-songwriters Category:English rock guitarists Category:English pianists Category:English record producers Category:Singers from Surrey Category:Musicians from Surrey Category:Writers from Surrey
